token_info.name: Little Buddha lotus-born
token_info.description: Interactive 3d scene for contemplation and mental relaxation. To switch to AR mode, click the white cube in the lower-right corner. If you don't see the AR activation cube in the lower-right corner, swipe from bottom to top. To rotate, swipe on an empty space. To move it, drag the shadow under the object. It may not display correctly on some older devices.
